DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct explore influencing factor , subject tester ' evaluation pain measurement hand-held pressure algometer different size probe . Methods:100 healthy undergraduate student ( 50 male 50 female ) recruit study . Pain measurement include pressure pain threshold ( PPT ) pressure pain tolerance ( PTO ) carry hand-held pressure algometer different size probe ( 1cm2 0.01cm2 ) three different measure spot right forearm . We record subject ' skinfold thickness , time per test procedure , type pain perception , receptivity degree accuracy well tester ' level laborious .
DOC.brief_title: To Measure Pain Perception With Electronic Pressure Algometer Different Size Probes : Healthy Subjects Research
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects follow disease exclude : know history chronic disease , psychiatric disease communication disorder , diabetes mellitus , severe cardiovascular disease , kidney liver diseases poor hepatic function , alcohol drug abuse , heavy smoker , Pregnancy lactation period .
DOC.criteria: Aged 20 30 The right hand handedness Agreed participate research Not know chronic disease Not take analgesic within 3 month History chronic pain Psychiatric diseases Diabetes mellitus Severe cardiovascular disease Kidney liver diseases Alcohol drug abuse Heavy smoker Disagree participate research
